data.text: @Podaaaanga Hey there, a personal item refers to a purse, briefcase, laptop bag or other item of similar size. A carry-on is a luggage that is <10 kg/22 lbs. Yes, you'd have to pay USD 35 for your 2ND checked piece of luggage. Your 1st checked bag is FREE
